mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TC_AUTH_MS WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_SN = #{authSn}
SELECT * FROM TC_AUTH_MS ORDER BY AUTH_SN DESC LIMIT #{skip} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC_AUTH_MS (AUTH_SN, AUTH_NM, USE_YN, REG_DATE, REG_SN, MOD_DATE, MOD_SN) VALUES (#{authSn}, #{authNm}, #{useYn}, #{regDate}, #{regSn}, #{modDate}, #{modSn})
